title: TASK_GO_STRAIGHT_TO_COORD
content:
0x80A9E7A7// TaskGoStraightToCoord
void TASK_GO_STRAIGHT_TO_COORD(Ped ped, float x, float y, float z, float speed, int timeout, float targetHeading, float distanceToSlide);Parameters:ped: The ped handle.x: The x coordinate.y: The y coordinate.z: The z coordinate.speed: The ped movement speed.timeout: -1 , other values appear to break the ped movement.targetHeading: The heading you want the ped to be on x,y,z coord.distanceToSlide: The distance from x,y,z where the ped will start sliding.TASK_GO_STRAIGHT_TO_COORDThis is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native TASK_GO_STRAIGHT_TO_COORD.
codeBlocks:
// TaskGoStraightToCoord
void TASK_GO_STRAIGHT_TO_COORD(Ped ped, float x, float y, float z, float speed, int timeout, float targetHeading, float distanceToSlide);
